page.title: 09Rogiet Churches
page.content: There are two 11th century churches at Rogiet,{St Mary's}and{St Michael {Lanvihangel.}Between 1980 and 1985 the following conservation work was carried out. At St Mary's the roof was repaired and the pinacles replaced; wire guards were fitted to windows; walls were repointed and the buttresses repaired; a new ceiling was put in the porch; the litchgate was repaired; old, dangerous yew trees were felled and the timber used to make side seats in porch. Advice and assistance was provided by the District and County Councils and the labour was provided by young unemployed men on a Y.O.P. scheme.
